get.summary:
Retrieve information for all accounts for a customer.
Note: Portfolio is for a shareholder and book-of-business is for a financial-institution representative.

parameters.name: fundSponsorId
parameters.description:
Unique ID for a fund sponsor.

Max Length: 5
Min Length: 1

parameters.name: authorizationContext
parameters.description:
authorizationContext is required for TA-SHD-* roles only.
authorizationContext is optional for OPR role (if not present, will use id from basic auth).

get.description:
Function:
Retrieve information for all accounts for a customer.

x-errors.x-message: expected a number with up to 5 digits
must be greater than or equal to 1

certificationCode.description:
A code denoting the status of the SSN.

Valid Values:
  • 0-9

Notes:
  • 0 = SS_MISSING
  • 1 = SSN_NON_CERTIFIED
  • 2 = SSN_CERTIFIED
  • 3 = TIN_NON_CERTIFIED
  • 4 = TIN_CERTIFIED
  • 5 = SS_APPLIED
  • 6 = SSN_IRS_OFFENDER
  • 7 = TIN_IRS_OFFENDER
  • 8 = SSN_ACCOUNT_TYPE_EXEMPT
  • 9 = TIN_ACCOUNT_TYPE_EXEMPT

certificationText.description:
The text describing the status of the SSN.

Valid Values:
  • Missing
  • SSN Non-Certified
  • SSN Certified
  • TIN Non-Certified
  • TIN Certified
  • SSN Applied
  • SSN IRS Offender
  • TIN IRS Offender
  • SSN Account Type Exempt
  • TIN Account Type Exempt

Notes: See certificationCode for mapping to numeric values.

isInconsistentCertificationCode.description: The value for the related parameter is NOT consistent across the positions. See General Description For ...Inconsistent... Response Parameters in the API description above.

isInconsistentCertificationText.description: The value for the related parameter is NOT consistent across the positions. See General Description For ...Inconsistent... Response Parameters in the API description above.

isInconsistentNumber.description: The value for the related parameter is NOT consistent across the positions. See General Description For ...Inconsistent... Response Parameters in the API description above.

isInconsistentType.description: The value for the related parameter is NOT consistent across the positions. See General Description For ...Inconsistent... Response Parameters in the API description above.

number.description: A unique number assigned by the IRS to identify a taxable entity.

type.description:
Indicates the type of Tax ID.

Valid Values:
  • EIN
  • SSN

accountId.description:
Unique ID used to identify a specific account(legal owner).

Format: Legal Owner ID1 (Max 11 digits) + Legal Owner ID2 (Max 11 digits)

accountNumber.description: A number that identifies an investor's position within a fund.

accountValue.description:
The total value of the account (legal ownership).

Max 17 digits with max 2 decimal points.

Ex : 99999999999.99

firmAccountNumber.description: The ID used by the fund group financial institution to identify the mutual fund account associated with NSCC requests.

hasAllocationModel.description: If true, there is an allocation model associated with the investment.

hasStopMail.description: If true, has a 'stop mail' restriction.

hasStopPurchase.description: If true, has a 'stop purchase' restriction.

hasTuitionSavingsPlanCode.description: If true, the fund is a Tuitions Savings Plan (529) fund.

isFiduciaryAccount.description: If true, the position is fiduciary (529 or retirement).

isInconsistentAccountNumber.description: The value for the related parameter is NOT consistent across the positions. See General Description For ...Inconsistent... Response Parameters in the API description above.

isInconsistentFirmAccountNumber.description: The value for the related parameter is NOT consistent across the positions. See General Description For ...Inconsistent... Response Parameters in the API description above.

isOpenAccount.description: If true, at least one position is open.

socialCode.description:
Identifies the type of account that is being returned.

Max 3 digits
Example: IRA Account

taxIdentification.description: Tax ID details associated with the specified entry.

hasEscheatmentLetters.description: If true, escheatment due diligence letters exist for the customer.

totalPortfolioValue.description:
Returns the sum of the account values within the portfolio.

Max 17 digits with max 2 decimal points.

Ex : 99999999999.99

detail.description: Registration details for the account (legal owner).

branchNumber.description: The dealer branch number associated with the Mutual Fund account.

dealerNumber.description: Internally assigned unique ID representing the financial institution.

isInconsistentBranchNumber.description: The value for the related parameter is NOT consistent across the positions. See General Description For ...Inconsistent... Response Parameters in the API description above.

isInconsistentDealerNumber.description: The value for the related parameter is NOT consistent across the positions. See General Description For ...Inconsistent... Response Parameters in the API description above.

isInconsistentRepresentativeNumber.description: The value for the related parameter is NOT consistent across the positions. See General Description For ...Inconsistent... Response Parameters in the API description above.

representativeNumber.description: The representative number associated with the Mutual Fund account.

fiduciaryPlanType.description:
Indicates the type of fiduciary account defined by the IRS.

Valid Values:
  • 0-18

Notes:
  • 0=UNKNOWN
  • 1=KEOGH
  • 2=BENEFIT
  • 3=IRA
  • 4=IRA_SPOUSAL
  • 5=DEFERRED
  • 6=IRA_SEP
  • 7=DEFERRED_403B
  • 8=401K
  • 9=SIMPLE_IRA
  • 10=CONVERSION_ROTH_IRA
  • 11=CONTRIBUTRY_ROTH_IRA
  • 12=EDUCATIONAL_IRA
  • 13=SAR_SEP
  • 14=GROUP_IRA
  • 15=NON_QUALIFIED
  • 16=SIMPLE_401K
  • 17=CASH_BALANCE
  • 18=401A_TAX_EXEMPT

fiduciaryPlanTypeText.description:
Text describing the fiduciary plan type.

Valid Values:
  • Unknown
  • KEOGH
  • BENEFIT
  • IRA
  • IRA SPOUSAL
  • DEFERRED
  • IRA SEP
  • DEFERRED 403B
  • 401K
  • SIMPLE IRA
  • CONVERSION ROTH IRA
  • CONTRIBUTRY ROTH IRA
  • EDUCATIONAL IRA
  • SAR SEP
  • GROUP IRA
  • NON QUALIFIED
  • SIMPLE 401K
  • CASH BALANCE
  • 401A TAX EXEMPT

Notes: See fiduciaryplanType for mapping to numeric values.

isInconsistentFiduciaryPlanType.description: The value for the related parameter is NOT consistent across the positions. See General Description For ...Inconsistent... Response Parameters in the API description above.

isInconsistentFiduciaryPlanTypeText.description: The value for the related parameter is NOT consistent across the positions. See General Description for ...Inconsistent... Response Parameters in the API description above.
